summary: DASHBOARD IS CRACKED ON BOTH SIDES NEAR THE AIRBAG SYSTEM.  SAFETY CONCERN SHOULD THE AIRBAG DEPLOY CAUSING SHARDS OF DEFECTIVE DASH TO ACT AS PROJECTILES INJURING THE OCCUPANTS OF THE VEHICLE.  THIS IS A COMMON PROBLEM WITH GM VEHICLES FROM 2007 TO 2013.  VEHICLE WAS PARKED WHEN CRACK WAS FIRST OBSERVED.
